title: Tropical Bard Skin Concept!

embed.description: My new skin concept, Tropical Bard! Tropical Bard

body:
http://sungben.deviantart.com/art/Tropical-Bard-Moves-578413731
^ **_Click this to see an enlarged, more clear version of the skill set._** ^

His head is a coconut by the way.

Hope you like it!

Check out some of my other work, too!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/gxpxwPvE-champion-concept-nollok-the-spectral-shadow

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/2vNxwwh7-champion-concept-valorie-the-child-of-mist

replies.body:
This is a really cute idea and I would totally buy it! I can see that this skin could have an interaction with Maokai or Zyra. I assume the noises it makes would sound less like chimes and more of wind in trees and bird chirping. More like a high 900+ or a legendary skin. It could even be like a sponsor skin where they donate X of the riot points for a nature charity.

The pineapple ult is perfict, it hits the ground and turns into mashed pineapple circles and slices. I think the shell part of the horn idea is better then the blowdart horn as it matches the skin theme of tropical.
I can totally see the meeps being sea creatures like you have or little brown totems like Maokai's tribal skin. The little masks is what I mean, I love the little masks.

Love the skin idea, it's the only one I've seen that's as good if not better then the Santa Bard ideas!

> [{quoted}](name=Owltears,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7KKOIKL0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-17T00:56:23.064+0000)
>
> This is a really cute idea and I would totally buy it! I can see that this skin could have an interaction with Maokai or Zyra. I assume the noises it makes would sound less like chimes and more of wind in trees and bird chirping. More like a high 900+ or a legendary skin. It could even be like a sponsor skin where they donate X of the riot points for a nature charity.
> 
> The pineapple ult is perfict, it hits the ground and turns into mashed pineapple circles and slices. I think the shell part of the horn idea is better then the blowdart horn as it matches the skin theme of tropical.
> I can totally see the meeps being sea creatures like you have or little brown totems like Maokai's tribal skin. The little masks is what I mean, I love the little masks.
> 
> Love the skin idea, it's the only one I've seen that's as good if not better then the Santa Bard ideas!

Thanks! Also, the other horn idea is supposed to be a rain stick.

Ah ok! I was wondering it if was simular cause the rainsticks i've seen look like this
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f8/Rainstick_01.png

If the rainstick was his horn I'd say his joke or taunt would be him causing rain and his meeps grown out of the ground where as if the horn was in use it could be that he blows into it and fish meeps swim to him. The joke for the horn could be he holds it to his ear, jumps and pops into a ton of fish/meeps cause a meep crab nipped his ear xD.

> [{quoted}](name=Owltears,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7KKOIKL0,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-12-17T01:06:43.429+0000)
>

> If the rainstick was his horn I'd say his joke or taunt would be him causing rain and his meeps grown out of the ground where as if the horn was in use it could be that he blows into it and fish meeps swim to him. The joke for the horn could be he holds it to his ear, jumps and pops into a ton of fish/meeps cause a meep crab nipped his ear xD.

That's actually kind of genius.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
Thumbs up, man.
I wouldn't get it, but it seems nice! I think someone is just downvoting to make their concept appear higher (and maybe doing it on alt accounts)

Or maybe it's because Bard just got a skin this patch.

On topic: I prefer the conch&Pearl combination for the horn, unless he's thinking of having two somehow.  It's both clever and fitting, and matches the original as well.

Wow youv'e come a long way, and improved your idea and added way more details and ideals in it. Much better then your original.

Wow I really like this concept. I especially like the clam with the pearl. Genius. :)

Btw, is that pineapple he's throwing intended to be him throwing his ult?
